resources:
To get one, follow this link, follow the directions and press "Create" at the end:
https://console.developers.google.com/flows/enableapi?apiid=maps_android_backend&keyType=CLIENT_SIDE_ANDROID&r=C4:A4:65:90:11:74:30:0F:72:96:66:D5:F2:28:3F:7E:59:D6:D4:33%3Bca.bcit.myapplication
You can also add your credentials to an existing key, using these values:
Package name: ca.bcit.myapplication
SHA-1 certificate fingerprint: C4:A4:65:90:11:74:30:0F:72:96:66:D5:F2:28:3F:7E:59:D6:D4:33
Alternatively, follow the directions here: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/android/start#get-key
Once you have your key (it starts with "AIza"), replace the "google_maps_key" string in this file. --> AIzaSyBGOp2avAcpQXvBODzt5HWN1H2kvGY5XUk
